commit changes: tmux send-keys -t 1 'git add . && git commit' Enter
claude show code: tmux send-keys -t 2 'claude "show me the project structure"' Enter
claude analyze security: tmux send-keys -t 2 'claude "Use code-reviewer subagent for security analysis"' Enter
claude review: tmux send-keys -t 2 'claude "Use code-reviewer subagent to review recent changes"' Enter
gemini analyze: tmux send-keys -t 3 'gemini "Analyze codebase structure and patterns"' Enter
grok generate tests: tmux send-keys -t 4 'grok "Generate test suite for recent changes"' Enter
full analysis: tmux send-keys -t 2 'claude "Deep analysis"' Enter && tmux send-keys -t 3 'gemini "Documentation"' Enter && tmux send-keys -t 4 'grok "Tests"' Enter
